titleStmt.title: A reply to a printed paper entituled, A brief account of the evidence given on behalf of Edmond Warner, at a trial at the bar the 24th. of November 1693, &c. Occasioned by some false reflections in the said paper upon the evidence given for the King at the said trial, wherein that they might gain greater credit, the author had the assurance to challenge any one to detect him of the least falshood therein.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Chetham's Library.
